dcterms:creator: S. M. Mohammad
S. Kiritchenko
dcterms:description: The Wiki Art Dataset contains works from 195 artists, with 42,129 images for training and 10,628 images for testing. The dataset has classified 20 emotions into three categories: positive, negative, and other/mixed. The images were manually tagged with the emotions they evoke in humans, with at least ten annotators for each work of art.
dcterms:title: Wiki Art Dataset
